test_module.name: sprint/us36550_snmp_hist_alrms/${WASS_TC_NAME}
test_module.test_case:
####################################################### # Test Sanity CGCS app/test #######################################################
CALL env LOOKFOR TYPE \n SINK 1 SEC PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1SSH PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con2 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s)
SET CR } SET CL {
SET COMMSTR test_community
Con1SSH TYPE source /etc/nova/openrc\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC Con1SSH TYPE export TMOUT=0\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC Con1SSH SINK 3 SEC
Con1SSH TYPE cd\n Con1SSH WAIT 3 SEC Con1SSH TYPE echo executing ${WASSP_TC_NAME}\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC
Con1SSH TYPE system snmp-comm-delete $COMMSTR\n Con1SSH CONTINUEIF Deleted community test_community Con1SSH CONTINUEIF Community not found: $COMMSTR Con1SSH WAIT 10 SEC Con1SSH CONTINUEIF
Con1SSH TYPE system snmp-comm-add -c $COMMSTR\n Con1SSH WAIT 10 SEC
Con1SSH TYPE system snmp-comm-list\n Con1SSH CONTINUEIF $COMMSTR Con1SSH WAIT 10 SEC
Con1SSH TYPE system snmp-comm-show -c $COMMSTR\n Con1SSH WAIT 10 SEC
CALL python3 ${WASSP_HOME}/testcases/cgcs/utils/getFile.py -i $env.NODE.target.Boot.oamFloat -u ${WRSUSER} -p ${WRSPASS} -s ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/mibs -d /usr/share/snmp/mibs/wrsAlarmMib.mib.txt -P 22
CALL python3 ${WASSP_HOME}/testcases/cgcs/utils/getFile.py -i $env.NODE.target.Boot.oamFloat -u ${WRSUSER} -p ${WRSPASS} -s ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/mibs -d /usr/share/snmp/mibs/wrsEnterpriseReg.mib.txt -P 22
CALL python3 ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/test_snmp_historical_alarms.py $env.NODE.target.Boot.oamFloat
PASS
